command.name: alert
command.summary: Alerts the messages in a JavaScript alert pop-up. If multiple messages are defined, they'll be concatenated together.

command.name: fade-in
command.summary: Fade in all matched elements by adjusting their opacity and firing an optional callback after completion.

command.name: fade-out
command.summary: Fade out all matched elements by adjusting their opacity to 0, then setting display to "none" and firing an optional callback after completion.
